result.title: [Attention] Personal training for ACM/ICPC
result.content:
Hello everyone,

I’m one of the contestants in World Final 2014 and won the third place (the champion of Asia) in the competition with my team Obsidian.

In the coming summer vacation, I want to find some partners who are somehow poor in algorithm competition and would like to train in this vacation. I can help you with some tough problems in online judge or other problems related to ACM/ICPC (such as the strategy during a contest). We can communicate via skype.

The motivation of the project is that I want to be more proficiency of English communication (I’m Chinese and somehow poor in English), and I’m aware of that I can help others with my advantages (algorithm competition) while practicing oral English.

If you are interested in this project, please contact with me via E-mail (echooatmeal@gmail.com)

UPDATE:

I have to explain that this "training" is not the real training and it is indeed like experience sharing. If you meet some tough problems in online judge, you can ask me for help (If I can solve this problem). Besides, I will shared my strategy and experience in competition.

I want to become a friend with you rather than a teacher.

I have received lots of mails and I'm so sorry that I have no plenty time for everyone who is interested in this project. So the person whose mother tongue is English or send mail earlier takes precedence. But you can also communicate with me via Codeforces talk or e-mail, and I will help you as possible as I can.

I'm sorry that I can not reply everyone who sent e-mail to me due to the gigantic number of mails I have received. I will notice you if I considered you as a participator.
